hero.title: Öz İnan Construction
hero.subtitle: Quality Constructions Since 1995
hero.description: We are a construction company that has been providing quality service in the construction sector since 1995. We continue to build modern and sustainable structures with our experienced team and innovative approach.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description: Öz İnan Construction, established in 1995, has been providing quality service in the construction sector for many years. We continue to build modern and sustainable structures with our experienced team and innovative approach. Our goal is to provide the best service to our customers and to be a pioneer in the sector with our quality constructions.
